title: Don’t fall for these morphed pictures of Salman Khan; here’s the truth | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A picture has surfaced on the internet in which Bollywood actor Salman Khan can be seen sitting in a mud pit on the road.

Similar pictures of Salman can be seen here and here.

ALSO READ: FACT CHECK: This is NOT the proposed design of Ram temple…

NewsMobile fact-checked the above picture and found it to be false.

On cropping and putting the picture through Reverse Image Search, we found the original picture of Salman on his official Twitter handle.

He had tweeted the above picture on July 14, 2020. In the caption, he wrote, “Respect to all the farmers . .”

In the above FAKE vs REAL collage, it is clear that Salman’s cut out was extracted from the picture he tweeted and placed at several places using photo editing software.

In conclusion, the above information proves that the picture in question is morphed.
